name: Pizza People
description:
V 1.2

WASD To move. Click to shoot. Try to kill the boss

Story: You are at your work and suddenly the pizza's turn EVIL!

Game Modes (no capital letters): easy, normal, hard, insane

Shop: Buy the Minigun for 2,000 sauce, The Shotgun for 3,000 sauce, And The Double Barrel for 5,000 sauce!
